SkillDec.SourceString: 弗丽嘉护盾值大幅提升。
SkillDec.LocalizedString: Frigg's shield strength greatly increases.

SkillDec.SourceString: 弗丽嘉每次命中玩家获得伤害提升，可叠加。
SkillDec.LocalizedString: Frigg gains a damage boost each time she lands a hit. This effect can stack.

SkillDec.SourceString: 弗丽嘉开启狂暴模式，所有行动速度大幅提升。
SkillDec.LocalizedString: Frigg enters Rampage Mode, greatly increasing her speed.

SkillDec.SourceString: 弗丽嘉进入极限状态，所有行动速度获得提升，会在脚下地面留下霜冻，碰到霜冻的玩家会受到伤害并被减速，最高叠加3层。
SkillDec.LocalizedString: Frigg enters Extreme Mode, increasing her speed and leaving frost under her feet. If you touch the frost, you will take damage and be slowed, which can be stacked up to 3 times.

SkillDec.SourceString: 攻击附带强力灰噬效果，需要提高对应元素抗性或避免被命中。
SkillDec.LocalizedString: Attacks come with a powerful Graying Bite effect. Increase corresponding elemental resistance or avoid being hit.

SkillDec.SourceString: BOSS生命血量越低减伤越高，BOSS变为处决机制，可用破盾高的武器对其破盾并处决，处决伤害无视怪物减伤，并与攻击和抗性和增伤有关。
SkillDec.LocalizedString: The lower the boss's HP, the greater its damage reduction. The boss can then be executed. Use weapons with high shatter to break its shield and execute it. Execution damage ignores the boss's damage reduction and is affected by the Wanderer's ATK, resistance, and damage boost.

SkillDec.SourceString: 获得地狱烈焰技能，大部分攻击会在地面留下大面积持续燃烧，避免进入燃烧区域。
SkillDec.LocalizedString: Gain the Infernal Flames skill. The majority of the boss's attacks will leave a large area on the ground that burns continuously. Avoid entering the burning areas.

SkillDec.SourceString: 场景随机生成大爆破，被命中会造成致命伤害，并在区域留下地狱烈焰。
SkillDec.LocalizedString: Large random explosions will occur in the area, dealing lethal damage upon hit and leaving Infernal Flames in the area.

SkillDec.SourceString: 弗丽嘉护盾值大幅提升。
SkillDec.LocalizedString: Frigg's shield strength greatly increases.

SkillDec.SourceString: 弗丽嘉每次命中玩家获得伤害提升，可叠加。
SkillDec.LocalizedString: Frigg gains a damage boost each time she lands a hit. This effect can stack.

SkillDec.SourceString: 弗丽嘉开启狂暴模式，所有行动速度大幅提升。
SkillDec.LocalizedString: Frigg enters Rampage Mode, greatly increasing her speed.

SkillDec.SourceString: 弗丽嘉进入极限状态，所有行动速度获得提升，会在脚下地面留下霜冻，碰到霜冻的玩家会受到伤害并被减速，最高叠加3层。
SkillDec.LocalizedString: Frigg enters Extreme Mode, increasing her speed and leaving frost under her feet. If you touch the frost, you will take damage and be slowed, which can be stacked up to 3 times.

SkillDec.SourceString: 瓦尔基里所有行动速度提升。
SkillDec.LocalizedString: Increase speed of all of Valkyrie's actions.

SkillDec.SourceString: 瓦尔基里每秒可以免疫一次伤害。
SkillDec.LocalizedString: Valkyrie is immune to damage 1 time every second.

SkillDec.SourceString: 瓦尔基里每隔一段时间会在自身周围地面留下可以被破坏的电极，电极每隔一定时间会对范围内释放圆形电流。
SkillDec.LocalizedString: Valkyrie leaves destructible electrodes on the ground around it at regular intervals. These electrodes periodically emit a circular electrical current in the surrounding area.

SkillDec.SourceString: 每隔一段时间，瓦尔基里会对周围降下落雷，落雷会造成致命伤害，并且进入感电状态，感电状态受到雷属性攻击命中会触电。
SkillDec.LocalizedString: Valkyrie summons lightning bolts around it at regular intervals, dealing lethal damage and electrifying targets. When an electrified target is hit by a volt attack, chain lightning is triggered.

SkillDec.SourceString: 巢母拥有较高抗暴能力，若被破防则抗暴能力暂时消失。
SkillDec.LocalizedString: The Hive Mother has high Crit Resistance. If her defenses are shattered, her Crit Resistance will temporarily disappear.

SkillDec.SourceString: 巢母进入战斗会召唤2只狂暴刑徒协助作战，刑徒处于无敌状态，巢母被击败后刑徒会死亡。
SkillDec.LocalizedString: Upon entering battle, the Hive Mother will summon 2 Rampage Prisoners to assist in combat. The Prisoners are in an invincible state, and will die once the Hive Mother is defeated.

SkillDec.SourceString: 巢母每隔5秒对锁定目标每秒造成致命伤害，若目标是坚毅则大幅降低该伤害，持续5秒。
SkillDec.LocalizedString: Every 5 seconds, the Hive Mother inflicts lethal damage every second to the locked-on target for 5 seconds. If the target has Fortitude, this damage is significantly reduced.

SkillDec.SourceString: 巢母每隔15秒检测周围，若周围没有同时存在强攻，均衡，坚毅，恩赐，则巢母所有攻击附带致命伤害。
SkillDec.LocalizedString: Every 15 seconds, the Hive Mother scans her surroundings. If Attack, Balance, Fortitude, and Benediction are not present at the same time, all of the Hive Mother's attacks will inflict lethal damage.

SkillDec.SourceString: 孤臣所有攻击额外造成生命百分比伤害，冷却3秒
SkillDec.LocalizedString: Forlorn Minister's attacks deal additional DMG based on the HP ratio. Cooldown: 3 seconds.

SkillDec.SourceString: 孤臣每隔一段时间会进入一小段无敌时间
SkillDec.LocalizedString: Forlorn Minister periodically gains a brief period of invincibility.

SkillDec.SourceString: 孤臣所有行动速度获得一定提升。
SkillDec.LocalizedString: Forlorn Minister temporarily gains increased movement speed.

SkillDec.SourceString: 孤臣护盾将几乎无法被击破。
SkillDec.LocalizedString: Forlorn Minister's shield becomes nearly unbreakable.

SkillDec.SourceString: 攻击附带强力灰噬效果，需要提高对应元素抗性或避免被命中。
SkillDec.LocalizedString: Attacks come with a powerful Graying Bite effect. Increase corresponding elemental resistance or avoid being hit.

SkillDec.SourceString: BOSS生命血量越低减伤越高，BOSS变为处决机制，可用破盾高的武器对其破盾并处决，处决伤害无视怪物减伤，并与攻击和抗性和增伤有关。
SkillDec.LocalizedString: The lower the boss's HP, the greater its damage reduction. The boss can then be executed. Use weapons with high shatter to break its shield and execute it. Execution damage ignores the boss's damage reduction and is affected by the Wanderer's ATK, resistance, and damage boost.

SkillDec.LocalizedString: Gain the Infernal Flames skill. The majority of the boss's attacks will leave a large area on the ground that burns continuously. Avoid entering the burning areas.

SkillDec.LocalizedString: Large random explosions will occur in the area, dealing lethal damage upon hit and leaving Infernal Flames in the area.

SkillDec.LocalizedString: Frigg's shield strength greatly increases.

SkillDec.SourceString: 弗丽嘉每次命中玩家获得伤害提升，可叠加。
SkillDec.LocalizedString: Frigg gains a damage boost each time she lands a hit. This effect can stack.

SkillDec.LocalizedString: Frigg enters Rampage Mode, greatly increasing her speed.

SkillDec.SourceString: 弗丽嘉进入极限状态，所有行动速度获得提升，会在脚下地面留下霜冻，碰到霜冻的玩家会受到伤害并被减速，最高叠加3层。
SkillDec.LocalizedString: Frigg enters Extreme Mode, increasing her speed and leaving frost under her feet. If you touch the frost, you will take damage and be slowed, which can be stacked up to 3 times.

SkillDec.LocalizedString: Increase speed of all of Valkyrie's actions.

SkillDec.LocalizedString: Valkyrie is immune to damage 1 time every second.

SkillDec.SourceString: 瓦尔基里每隔一段时间会在自身周围地面留下可以被破坏的电极，电极每隔一定时间会对范围内释放圆形电流。
SkillDec.LocalizedString: Valkyrie leaves destructible electrodes on the ground around it at regular intervals. These electrodes periodically emit a circular electrical current in the surrounding area.

SkillDec.LocalizedString: Valkyrie summons lightning bolts around it at regular intervals, dealing lethal damage and electrifying targets. When an electrified target is hit by a volt attack, chain lightning is triggered.

SkillDec.SourceString: 孤臣所有攻击额外造成生命百分比伤害，冷却3秒
SkillDec.LocalizedString: Forlorn Minister's attacks deal additional DMG based on the HP ratio. Cooldown: 3 seconds.

SkillDec.SourceString: 孤臣每隔一段时间会进入一小段无敌时间
SkillDec.LocalizedString: Forlorn Minister periodically gains a brief period of invincibility.

SkillDec.SourceString: 孤臣所有行动速度获得一定提升。
SkillDec.LocalizedString: Forlorn Minister temporarily gains increased movement speed.

SkillDec.SourceString: 孤臣护盾将几乎无法被击破。
SkillDec.LocalizedString: Forlorn Minister's shield becomes nearly unbreakable.

SkillDec.SourceString: 刑天生命值低于25%会对周围造成一次伤害并进入15秒无敌，该效果只会触发一次。
SkillDec.LocalizedString: Xingtian deals damage once to nearby enemies and gains invicibility for 15s when HP drops below 25%. Triggers only once.

SkillDec.SourceString: 刑天对比自己生命百分比高的目标造成的伤害大幅提升。
SkillDec.LocalizedString: Xingtian deals significantly increased damage to targets with a higher HP ratio than himself.

SkillDec.SourceString: 刑天命中非坚毅目标有概率大幅降低目标所有行动速度，持续4秒。
SkillDec.LocalizedString: Xingtian has a chance to significantly reduce the movement speed of non-Fortitude targets for 4s when hitting them.

SkillDec.SourceString: 刑天所有行动速度大幅提升。
SkillDec.LocalizedString: Xingtian significantly increases his movement speed.

SkillDec.SourceString: 攻击附带强力灰噬效果，需要提高对应元素抗性或避免被命中。
SkillDec.LocalizedString: Attacks come with a powerful Graying Bite effect. Increase corresponding elemental resistance or avoid being hit.

SkillDec.LocalizedString: Increase speed of all of Valkyrie's actions.

SkillDec.LocalizedString: Valkyrie is immune to damage 1 time every second.

SkillDec.LocalizedString: Valkyrie summons lightning bolts around it at regular intervals, dealing lethal damage and electrifying targets. When an electrified target is hit by a volt attack, chain lightning is triggered.

SkillDec.SourceString: 刑天生命值低于25%会对周围造成一次伤害并进入15秒无敌，该效果只会触发一次。
SkillDec.LocalizedString: Xingtian deals damage once to nearby enemies and gains invicibility for 15s when HP drops below 25%. Triggers only once.

SkillDec.SourceString: 刑天对比自己生命百分比高的目标造成的伤害大幅提升。
SkillDec.LocalizedString: Xingtian deals significantly increased damage to targets with a higher HP ratio than himself.

SkillDec.SourceString: 刑天命中非坚毅目标有概率大幅降低目标所有行动速度，持续4秒。
SkillDec.LocalizedString: Xingtian has a chance to significantly reduce the movement speed of non-Fortitude targets for 4s when hitting them.

SkillDec.SourceString: 刑天所有行动速度大幅提升。
SkillDec.LocalizedString: Xingtian significantly increases his movement speed.

SkillDec.SourceString: 英招每隔20秒获得一个可以抵挡40次伤害的护盾。
SkillDec.LocalizedString: Ying Zhao gains a shield every 20 seconds, capable of blocking up to 40 instances of damage.

SkillDec.SourceString: 英招无法被暴击。
SkillDec.LocalizedString: Ying Zhao cannot be critically hit.

SkillDec.SourceString: 英招会随机选择3个目标形成连线，并且自身进入无敌状态，只有处于被连线包围状态才会受到伤害。
SkillDec.LocalizedString: Ying Zhao randomly selects 3 targets to form a triangular link, becoming invincible. Only enemies enclosed within the triangle take damage.

SkillDec.SourceString: 英招每隔15秒会对周围造成近3秒受到的伤害，该伤害不会造成致命。
SkillDec.LocalizedString: Ying Zhao unleashes damage taken over the past 3 seconds to nearby enemies every 15 seconds. This damage cannot be fatal.
